Text: This torrent is crap. The aspect ratio of the movie itself is 2.35:1, but the image is 4:3. So huge black bars on the top and bottom are included in the image. The black bars make up more than half of the image. This of course means that the space (in bytes) allotted to the movie itself is significantly less than it should have been, with the resulting loss of quality. The image quality is okay, but should have been much better in a 1.3 GB file.
